word_mean: 氧化酶：一种氧化还原酶类，任何一种能通过加进氧催化底物氧化，或以氧分子作为被排出的氢或电子的接受体的酶

sentence.Network_en: Monoamine oxidase ( MAO ) inhibitors were introduced into therapy for the treatment of depression in 1957.
sentence.Network_cn: 单胺氧化酶 ( MAO ) 抑制剂1957年被推荐用来治疗抑郁症.

sentence.Network_en: One relied on the DNA sequence of a gene called cytochrome oxidase.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一种方式是根据一种叫做细胞色素氧化酶基因的DNA序列.

sentence.Network_en: The polysaccharide moiety of glucose oxidase contains N - acetylglucosamine and mannose.
sentence.Network_cn: 葡萄糖氧化酶的多醣构造中,含有N - 乙醯胺基葡萄糖及甘露糖.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French oxydase, from oxyde 'oxide'

means.word_mean: 1. any of the enzymes that catalyze biological oxidation
